div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1937 Tiriolo, 10 km. NW of Catanzaro, (424) Bruttium, c. 1840 ? Burial: late 4th cent. B.C.? (K) Contents: 97 AV. Pot hoard Locri Disposition: dispersed Fiorelli, Monete inedite dell'Italia antica (Naples, 1845), p. 22, note Riccio, Repertorio (Naples, 1852), "Notes," p. 12, note 72
